summary: When a new family moves to an old house in Amityville, they are tormented and tortured by an evil spirit living in the home while trapped by the malicious townspeople who want to keep them there.
cast: Nicole Tompkins|Kaiwi Lyman|Kim Nielsen|Amanda Barton|Trevor Stines|Christy St. John|Tonya Kay|Bobby Emprechtinger|Lai-Ling Bernstein|Klaudia Kaye|Korey Knecht|Sarah Lieving|Cher Hubsher|Priscilla Emprechtinger|Jocelyn Saenz|Tommy Nash|Kingsley Knecht|Philip Day|Julia Rae|Guillermo Dorado|Llenelle Gibson|Scott Anthony Gould|Ruffy Landayan|Mikey Montgomery
title: Terror en Amityville
